verses.roman:
ithe aparādha mora nā la-io, bhakta-gaṇa
tomā-sabāra caraṇa--mora ekānta śaraṇa

synonyms: ithe—in this; aparādha—offenses; mora—my; nā la-io—do not take; bhakta-gaṇa—O devotees; tomā—of your; sabāra—of all; caraṇa—the lotus feet; mora—my; ekānta—only; śaraṇa—shelter.
translation: O devotees, please do not consider my offenses in this regard. Your lotus feet are my only shelter.
